title: Essential Oils For Diffusion Meditation Blend
description: The Meditation blend of essential oils for diffusion contains 4 essential oils that are the queens of serenity invite you to meditate and "let go". The fine and mild notes of Rosewood, the woody notes of the Atlas cedar, a reassuring, majestic and wise tree, help you free yourself from your daily anxiety.
